value.0: Welcome! Are you looking to take out a horse or make a purchase?
Would you like to take out a horse?
For a modest fee, you could purchase into the horse-exchange program and receive a horse at any of our participating locations. Different horses cost different amounts...
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
What form of horse would you like to access?
Here is your horse receipt and horse!
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
Here is your horse receipt and horse!
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
Here is your horse receipt and horse!
You don't have enough gold to purchase that!
Oh! My <Lord/Lady>, you have need of a horse? Of course, of course. Here, take my finest steed.
[Show the merchant your receipt for a horse.]
[Ask to buy into the horse-exchange program.]
[Show the merchant your Writ of Knighthood.]
